documents.document: I think this should be the weather icon for Wellington today: sideways rain. :P #notSummer https://t.co/SkbloLyNu5
Timely. Ronald Chump in my Tiny Tower this morning... https://t.co/VxrQdb1wFp
@FlamingAim you're on! :)
@FlamingAim just as Claire commented, we're still on track. Strongest winds overnight to dawn or so. Tie it down or put it away!
Check your sources for weather advice folks - there's some ill-informed comments kicking around. See @MetService for official warnings.
Well, bugger. Sorry folks, we tried... https://t.co/6L7Renaxxh
That's a big boat! The "Ovation of the Seas" visiting Wellington today dwarfs the Interislander and stadium... https://t.co/rKYUqcVpUZ
Brace for rain Wellington... https://t.co/v0H7M2FTQD
Quake M7.2 - 221km SW of Nadi, Fiji https://t.co/Do0sv5SWGi - PTWC have possible tsunami waves for Fiji: https://t.co/e6EN1gMCc6
Spent last two days sanding walls/frames for painting and now the fingerprint sensor on my phone doesn't recognize me... #1stworldproblems
Grumpy Cat is right. The days get shorter now as winter approaches... :P https://t.co/41UxBqCgeI
Eyes south Wellington - that strong cold southerly with rain is motoring up the Kaikoura Coast - should be here inâ€¦ https://t.co/Yn9DwMzmlb
Hello Auckland. My 30 day mo is in you! There is still time to donate to the Movember effort:â€¦ https://t.co/G8JJbl2ugv
Two weeks before/after the M7.8 #eqnz. 99 quakes before, 6099 after! Credit to @geonet for the data. https://t.co/Eyoz7m3SOk
If you want a moustache to support for Movember, here ya go: https://t.co/GgJF9yuO4M :) https://t.co/ZnaGY9Y8Cm
@lertinfo thanks! :)
Three days of quakes via @geonet slowly dropping off in mag./freq. No M6+ on Tue, no M5+ yest. That's a good trendâ€¦ https://t.co/BF3wxBoARx
A little shower just for Petone and Lower Hutt. https://t.co/jLXsSmRLZU
@JudgeRock that's a bit outside my current skillset - @geonet might be able to though... ;)
@AlanHesketh maybe, with a power curve perhaps. Would make for interesting verification of forecast sequence on a freq plot...
@lertinfo true dat. Just 6 M5+ to 10pm today, versus 40 M5+ yesterday (I like that trend!)
@AlanHesketh they've only posted 1/7/30 day probabilities, latest forecast from noon today but not from T=0...
Playing with @geonet #eqnz data... Time-magnitude plot for aftershock forecast area to 10pm. Data table from:â€¦ https://t.co/Jz2yUygh5f
Well played @DomPost - should have dropped the subhead though... ;) #trump https://t.co/d2lABUDGk2
I have Dump the Trump for beer o'clock today. The world is watching America. Please don't fuck this up. https://t.co/XNgr1ad9Qf
@thurrott have you written anything on disabling auto-reboot after update on Win10 Home Anniv update? Feature gone. PITA for a 24/7 pc...
They are real and they will return! And so will end two weeks of southerly flow over central NZ...â€¦ https://t.co/cvT1855mUs
Ridding the world of little monsters. 2+ months. 121 uniques. 20 still to catch... #Pogo #PokemonGO https://t.co/Vtt4686YNA
"Friendversary". Srsly FB?! When you do shit like this, check your relationship data properly (hint: we're married!) https://t.co/70RARj4h64
Snowing in Kelburn. Not heavily or settling, but there are flakes out there.
The uniques have dried up in the past week. 101 from 1500 in just over 1 month. #PokemonGo #pogo https://t.co/MBTbY8NyQt
Hmmm, the beast in disguise? #pogo #pokemongo https://t.co/hW09FWfh9S
Pine pollen all over my car. Is it Spring already?

Some young entrepreneurs with a scone shop provided a tasty start to my day. Great way to earn pocket money! https://t.co/5fdhWcngKj
@FlamingAim @plambrechtsen excellent, so you'll be well placed to coach me then. I can now honestly say "I'm going to the gym" there's a 1st
@FlamingAim and by "kids" I actually mean me... ;)
Colder SW winds spreading over NZ. 3 day trajectory for low level air arriving near Christchurch 6am Mon shows why! https://t.co/iGyGdC90OZ
Gotcha! The catch of the day the kids were waiting for. :) https://t.co/rEWUNeWMhx

Sun dogs this morning over Wellington. https://t.co/75rh1aikmm

@wxjerdman sure thing, thanks to Taiwan CWB.

@MetService blue skies in Napier confirmed. I could get used to this... https://t.co/Whk72EP78R

Sure why not... https://t.co/TkQcKfsRtX

Tropical Depression 17F northeast of Fiji looking more organised in recent imagery... Cyclone brewing! https://t.co/aNMIf2IizF
Haiku for my kids... Mum back tomorrow. House must stay clean until then. Takeaways it is. :)
Hello Tropical Cyclone Zena. Named overnight, just passed Vanuatu, now heading for Fiji... https://t.co/vIOjvHaeNh

@olafquintessa and they always give up when you're about to head somewhere. Tires I can schedule and cope with. Batteries dying are a PITA!
@plambrechtsen $199 to the AA man for a new battery and we're off! Grumble Grumble...
That sinking feeling when you turn the ignition key and the car does... nothing...
